com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Interface KGlowParametersBuilderType


  • public interface KGlowParametersBuilderType
    A mutable builder interface for constructing parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KGlowParameters build() 
      void setBlurSize(float size)
      Set the blur size.
      void setFactor(float factor)
      The factor by which to multiply the final glow effect.
      void setPasses(int passes)
      Set the number of passes.
      void setScale(float scale)
      The amount of downsampling to be performed during blurring.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        KGlowParameters build()
        Returns:
        A new set of blur parameters initialized to all of the values given to the builder so far.

      • setBlurSize

        void setBlurSize(float size)

        Set the blur size. A blur size larger than 1.0 will typically result in visible banding.

        The default is 1.0.

        Parameters:
        size - The size of the blur effect.

      • setFactor

        void setFactor(float factor)

        The factor by which to multiply the final glow effect.

        The default is 1.

        Parameters:
        factor - The factor by which to multiply the final glow effect

      • setPasses

        void setPasses(int passes)

        Set the number of passes. A greater number of passes will strengthen the effect of the blur at the cost of processing time. A value of 0 will result in no blur being applied at all.

        The default is 1.

        Parameters:
        passes - The number of passes

      • setScale

        void setScale(float scale)

        The amount of downsampling to be performed during blurring. A value of 1.0 implies no scaling. A value of 0.5 will halve the width and height of the original image before blurring. The more downsampling applied, the stronger the effect of the blur (but the greater the loss of image precision).

        The default is 1.

        Parameters:
        scale - The coefficient by which to multiply the dimensions of the image
